verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician<s%> on <S%H5058>Neginoth<s%> upon <S%H8067>Sheminith,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> me not in your <S%H639>anger,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3256>chasten<s%> me in your <S%H2534>hot<s%> <S%H2534>displeasure.<s%>
Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on me, O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> for I am <S%H536>weak:<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H7495>heal<s%> me; for my <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H926>vexed.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is also <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H926>vexed:<s%> but you, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5704>how<s%> <S%H5704>long?<s%>
<S%H7725>Return,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2502>deliver<s%> my <S%H5315>soul:<s%> oh <S%H3467>save<s%> me for your <S%H2617>mercies'<s%> <S%H4616>sake.<s%>
For in <S%H4194>death<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> of you: in the <S%H7585>grave<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> shall give you <S%H3034>thanks?<s%>

I am <S%H3021>weary<s%> with my <S%H585>groaning;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3915>night<s%> make I my <S%H4296>bed<s%> to <S%H7811>swim;<s%> I <S%H4529>water<s%> my <S%H6210>couch<s%> with my <S%H1832>tears.<s%>
My <S%H5869>eye<s%> is <S%H6244>consumed<s%> because of <S%H3708>grief;<s%> it waxes <S%H6275>old<s%> because of <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6887>enemies.<s%>
<S%H5493>Depart<s%> from me, <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity;<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H1065>weeping.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H8467>supplication;<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H3947>receive<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer.<s%>
Let <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H341>enemies<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H926>vexed:<s%> let them <S%H7725>return<s%> and be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> <S%H7281>suddenly.<s%>
